name: 2024 13th International Conference on Computing and Pattern Recognition
content: Publication&Indexing: 1\. ICCPR 2024 Conference Proceedings by ACM (ISBN: 979-8-4007-1748-2), archived in ACM Digital Library, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, reviewed by CPCI. 2\. Journal of Advances in Information Technology (ISSN: 1798-2340; CiteScore: 2.4): indexed by ESCI (Web of Science), Scopus, EBSCO, Google Scholar, CNKI, Crossref, etc. 3\. International Journal of Machine Learning (IJML) (E-ISSN: 2972-368X), which will be indexed by Inspec (IET), Google Scholar, Crossref, ProQuest, Electronic Journals Library, CNKI.
